extension_description.message: Generate or scan QR codes offline.

copy_image_btn_title.message: Copy this QR code image to the clipboard

open_url_btn_title.message: Open the scanned URL in a new tab

github_link_title.message: Visit QR Lite's project page on Github

error_correction_level_btn_low_title.message: Low, 7% of data bytes can be restored

error_correction_level_btn_medium_title.message: Medium, 15% of data bytes can be restored

error_correction_level_btn_quartile_titl.message: Quartile, 25% of data bytes can be restored

error_correction_level_btn_high_title.message: High, 30% of data bytes can be restored

content_length_label_title.message: Length of the QR code content in characters

content_placeholder.message: Type in some text to generate a QR code

context_menu_make_qr_code_for_link.message: Generate QR Code for This Link

scan_instructions_html.message:
Right-click on any image and choose
" Scan QR Code in This Image"

scan_from_clipboard_instructions_html.message:
Scan clipboard image by pressing
Ctrl + V
or âŒ˜ + V on Mac

grant_permissions_instructions_html.message:
This feature requires the following additional permission.

$PERMISSION$

grant_all_urls_permission_name.message: Access to your data for all websites

grant_camera_initial_instructions_html.message:
You're about to grant QR Lite access to your camera.

When asked whether to allow QR Lite to use your camera, make sure the "Remember this decision" checkbox is checked, then click "Allow".

Click the button below to start.

grant_camera_blocked_instructions_html.message:
It looks like QR Lite is blocked from using the camera.

To change this setting, click the permissions icon on the left of the address bar, and remove the "Blocked" status on the "Use the camera" row.

After you've done that, refresh this page.

grant_camera_granted_instructions_html.message:
QR Lite has been successfully granted permission to use the camera.

You may close this page now.

grant_all_urls_initial_instructions_html.message:
You're about to grant QR Lite access to your data for all websites.

Click the button below to start.

grant_all_urls_blocked_instructions_html.message: Permission not granted. Please refresh this page and try again.

grant_all_urls_granted_instructions_html.message:
QR Lite has been successfully granted access to your data for all websites.

You may close this page now.

select_region_to_scan_open_command_descr.message: Select region to scan and open URL

select_region_to_scan_open_new_bg_tab_co.message: Select region to scan and open URL in new background tab

select_region_to_scan_open_new_fg_tab_co.message: Select region to scan and open URL in new foreground tab

picker_url_mode_auto_open_in_current_tab.message: Auto open URL in current tab

picker_url_mode_auto_open_in_bg_tab.message: Auto open URL in new background tab

picker_url_mode_auto_open_in_fg_tab.message: Auto open URL in new foreground tab
